text: Nông Đức Mạnh (; born 11 September 1940) is a Vietnamese politician. He was General Secretary of the Communist Party of Vietnam from 22 April 2001 to 19 January 2011.Vietnam: Foreign Policy and Government Guide International Business Publications, USA. – 2007 Page 8 "Vietnamese Government Communist state – General Secretary Nông Ðức Mạnh – President Nguyễn Minh Triết – Prime Minister Nguyễn Tấn Dũng " ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:General Secretaries of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam
title: Nông Đức Mạnh
